page.title: 12VILLAGE SCHOOL HISTORY.
page.content: SCHOOL.In the early 60's Secondary children went to the new Modern School at Martley.Grammar School children at first attended schools in Kidderminster and Hartlebury and later in Worcester. In September 1983 Comprehensive Education was introduced to the whole of the new County of Hereford and Worcester.The Chantry Secondary school Martley becoming the Chantry High School.This school now caters for the education of all children over the age of eleven years. Abberley Parochial Primary School caters for both Infants and Juniors, between 50 and 60 children on roll and a teaching staff of a Headteacher and 1.5 staff.
